Control Name: 3.4.6 You have validated the SKU and configuration choices are appropriate for your anticipated loads.
Control Statement: Understand which SKUs you have selected and ensure that they are the correct size. Additionally, ensure you understand the configuration of those SKUs (e.g. auto-scale settings for Application Gateways and App Services).

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.4 How have you accounted for capacity and scaling requirements of your workload?
